amendment.description: Amendment provides for expedited judicial review of the constitutionality of the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide for expedited Judicial review of the constitutionality of the provisions of the bill. (Text of the amendment was printed as amendment No. 11 in the Congressional Record of February 1, 1995.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Deal amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
